text: Nde guigira buna guareŋ zɨn vui. Nde maaŋ mbuav, nde nduarira Fhe Bakɨme rɨmani nɨman ŋgarav ki. Nde maaŋ mbuav, nde wari won ndavir nza phorgɨp guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨɨi. Nde maaŋ mbui, nde khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip, guigira mbe vuzvugɨp, guigira wari won ndavir za mben nɨɨŋri.
